+ Nurse Glass

Glass is a pullable support character released in version 1.2 in Foundation Crumbling.

++ Lore

[[=]]
//"Dr. Glass seems too occupied with helping others to even think about his own needs."//
//- In-game description//
[[/=]]

Dr. Glass works as a nurse and therapist, and is stated to have interacted with a majority of playable humanoid anomalies from Site-19. Though it seems like this wasn't always the case as acknowledged in Mission Pretty Oddities and Anomalies, where he states he used to carry a rifle rather than a staff.

Personality wise he is sweet, understanding, and easy to get along. Despite this, Glass is a rather secretive person, with many stating that the doctor struggles to open up to others. Ultimately, not much is currently known about Glass' deeper lore, besides what has been hinted at by other characters and in-game item descriptions. Many believe an update centered around Glass will be coming soon.





++ Gameplay

Glass focuses in healing other characters in your party through the use of medical anomalies rather than inflicting direct damage to the enemy.

**Medical Checkup:**

Basic healing ability. Restores a percentage of the target's life, this percentage depends on the current remaining HP of the target. Below 50% the target recovers 25% of its HP, below 75% it recovers 20% and below 100% it recovers 15%

**Un-Authorized SCP-500 deployment:**

Glass' ultimate, completely heals all party members and increases their attack by one stage.

+ Trivia

* Glass has no medical degree nor schooling, it seems unlikely he has a psychology degree.

* Glass does have a degree in military science.
